          <title>
            <string language="en">Evaporating water-salt mixture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdunstende Wasser-Salz Mischung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mélange d'évaporation d'eau-sel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mistura evaporando de água-sal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Miscela d'evaporazione del acqua-sale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξατμίζοντας ύδωρ-αλατισμένο μίγμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mezcla de la agua-sal que se evapora</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the formation of salt crystals at the bottom of the container when water evaporates.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crystals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock formation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sedimentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sediments</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Anordnung der 
Salzkristalle an der Unterseite des Behälters, wenn Wasser 
verdunstet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre la formation des cristaux de 
sel au bas du récipient quand l'eau s'évapore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra a formação de cristais de 
sal no fundo do recipiente quando a água evapora.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra la formazione dei cristalli 
del sale alla parte inferiore del contenitore quando l'acqua si 
volatilizza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει το σχηματισμό των 
αλατισμένων κρυστάλλων στο κατώτατο σημείο του 
εμπορευματοκιβωτίου πότε το ύδωρ εξατμίζει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra la formación de los 
cristales de la sal en el fondo del envase cuando el agua se evapora.</string>
          </description>
